abstract.p: Sullivan & Cromwell leads list of 2006 mergers and acquisitions law firms for third consecutive year; graph shows top ten global firms (S)1

block.p: Sullivan & Cromwell ended 2006 as the leading mergers and acquisitions law firm for the third consecutive year, according to Bloomberg News. Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom rose to No. 2 from eighth place, helped by its work for Arcelor in its acquisition by Mittal Steel.

Correction: January 12, 2007, Friday A ''Back of the Envelope'' chart on the Street Scene page of Business Day last Friday, about the leading law firms for mergers and acquisitions in 2006, misstated in the summary the 2005 ranking of this year's top firm, Sullivan & Cromwell. It finished third; Freshfields Bruckhaus Deringer was first.
